duties_responsibilities.duty: Assess, plan, and implement psychosocial patient/family needs for patients aged neonatal to 17 years.
Meet the emotional, developmental and psychosocial needs of patients and families with an emphasis on mastering the challenges of illness, injury and hospitalization.
Strive to decrease stressful experiences and anxiety in patients and families.
Align self to opportunities that promote professional development in the field.

education_certification.credential: BA in Child Life, Child Development, or a health-related field with child life emphasis
